long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
USDC Local Currency Converter is a lightweight and efficient Chrome extension that helps you quickly convert USDC (USD Coin) to your local currency. Perfect for crypto traders and enthusiasts who need quick conversions.

### Key Features:
• Automatic location-based currency detection
• Real-time USDC price updates
• One-click amount copying
• Clean, intuitive interface
• Privacy-focused with no data collection

### How it works:
1. Click the extension icon
2. Enter your USDC amount
3. Instantly see the converted amount in your local currency
4. Copy the amount with one click

### Technical Details:
• Uses real-time cryptocurrency data from CoinGecko
• Automatic currency updates every minute
• Supports all major world currencies
• No registration or setup required

### Privacy:
• No personal data collection
• Location detection only for currency selection
• No analytics or tracking
• Open privacy policy available
